SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

processSurplus(address).details: This function will swap the surplus of a collateral for the stable asset link to the protocol.

params.collateral: The collateral address to process the surplus of.

returns.issuedAmount: The amount of newly issued stablecoins from the collateral swapped
returns.stableSurplus: The surplus amount in stable calculated from the collateral surplus.

returns.amounts: The amounts released to the payees

release().notice: Releases the income to the payees
